WRITING.TEXT: The idea of having nothing to lose is something you can lose. Say you are single man with no debts and no assets, you have nothing to lose. You have a kid, and you lost your nothing to lose

WRITING.TITLE: If you have nothing to lose, you have something to lose.
Do other species that mate for life experience infidelity?
WRITING.TEXT: Like, I know swans form monogamous relationships, but has one ever cheated?
When did we turn friction off?

WRITING.TITLE: What would happen if there was no other celestial bodies beyond earth, moon and sun?
WRITING.TEXT: How do you think civilization would be? If earth was and the sun and moon was all? Would we be different?
